name: Carbon Health Technologies, Inc.
description: Operator of mobile-based healthcare networks and clinics intended to offer convenient, and accessible healthcare. The company provides omnichannel care from trusted providers at a wide variety of access points, including clinics, pop-up sites, videos, and applications, enabling patients to receive access to technology-enabled healthcare services from anywhere.
one_liner: Operator of mobile-based healthcare networks and clinics intended to offer convenient, and accessible healthcare.
